participant_1.background:
I enjoy cooking elaborate meals on the weekends, especially during the holidays.
I spend time with my book club and read books I love.
I'm doing my best to maintain a healthy weight.
I met a group of amazing people from all over the world who shared my passion for adventure.
i like the color purple.

participant_2.background:
I'm curious about the history of the lake near my house.
I love going on YouTube to watch video tutorials for my online classes and to find new recipes to cook for my family.
i work in a circus as a juggler.
I wake up early and listen to Ween to get my creative juices flowing.
I want to conquer my anxiety so I can live my life to the fullest.

content.text: Hey! What are you up to today?
I'm doing well! I'm working on a new juggling routine that I'm going to perform at the circus.
That's awesome! I'm sure it's going to be great.
Thanks! I'm excited to share it with everyone.
What got you interested in juggling?
I've always loved watching jugglers, and I thought it would be a fun skill to learn.
That's a great reason! I'm glad you decided to pursue it.
Me too! It's been really rewarding.
Do you have any other hobbies?
Yeah, I love to cook, and I'm also a member of a book club.
That's awesome! I love to cook too. What's your favorite thing to cook?
I love making pasta dishes. I'm also really good at making homemade pizza.
Those sound delicious! I love pizza.
I'm glad we have something in common!
Me too! We should exchange recipes sometime.
